verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: You are all Sisters: You are all B: together lovely S: together lovely B: you are the most S: you are the most B: desirable One S: desirable One (repeat above){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}B: You are resplendent S: Lord You are B: more majestic S: Lord You are All: than the mountains of prey{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}B: you are resplendent S: Lord You are B: more majestic S: Lord You are{/lang-eng}
